title: Antithesis
description: My name is Gavyn.Liam doesn’t care that I only have one arm. He actually likes my red hair and freckles. I might forgive him for kidnapping me.My name is Gavyn.I lost my Liam. I’ve lost them all. And now it’s my job to make sure they don’t show up again. My name is Gavyn.I had a life with Liam, but he couldn’t give me what I need. Then I killed his father. I don’t expect he’ll forgive me for that.My name is Gavyn.
author: Kacey Vanderkarr
